utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know, I'm thinking about letting Emma have her first cookie.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Her first cookie? She has cookies all the time!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I've never given her a cookie. Have you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No... and, for the record, I've also never given her a frosting from a can!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Rach, the adoption agency needs letters of recommendation and we were wondering if you would write one for us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Of course, I'd be honored!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: U-U-Um, I think there's been an oversight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey, we would've asked you, we just thought you wouldn't be interested.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, it's just we don't think of you as really being so much "with the words".

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoo-weh hey weh-hey whoo hey!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Clearly we were wrong.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I gotta a lot of nice stuff to say about you guys, ok? And I know how much you wanna have a baby, you know, and I would love to help you get one.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know what? Then, Joey, we want you to do it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you! Alright, let me see how I'm gonna start... "Dear baby adoption decider people..."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So excited about your letter!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! Don't you look nice?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, I do! Today is Mike and my one-year anniversary.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OH! What's it the anniversary of? Your first date, your first kiss, first time you had sex...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: YEAH!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you must be going to somewhere fancy to celebrate?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-uh. Ehm, a Knicks game.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhm... Aren't you a little overdressed?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, you know what, I've never had a one-year anniversary before, so no matter where we go, I'm wearing something fancy pants, and... I'm gonna put on my finest jewelry and we're gonna have sex in a public rest room.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You guys do that? Chandler won't even have sex in our bathroom!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's where people make number two!!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey...

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: So, you know... I have a little time. If you... if you want to...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh... Ohh... I'd love to but I really have to grade these papers.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Fine, it's fine... I'll just shower by myself...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: B, B, B, B, B!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh, Ross, you gave a B to a Pottery Barn catalogue.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, it had some good ideas, take off your shirt.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Rachel!! Open up!! It's your sister!! I have to talk to you!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi Amy!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You're not Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Still sharp as a tack!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Um... Charlie, this is Rachel's sister Amy. Amy, this is Charlie.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: H-Hi!! And you are...?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ross? I... I grew up on your block! We had Thanksgiving together last year... I had a baby with your sister!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: N-no... uhm... did I buy a falafel from you yesterday?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yes, you did.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi Rachel! Here's your sister Amy! She thinks I need pec implants!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Amy! Hi! Oh-oh-hoh! Wow! You remember Joey?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Yeah! Hey, sure! The "Days of Our Lives" guy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's right, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You're not good!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Always nice to meet a fan!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So now, what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Well, I have huge news.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh sorry, hold on. Let me just check on the baby!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Wait, this is important! Can Ella wait?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ehm... Her name is Emma.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Why did you change it, Ella was so much prettier!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What do I know? I just sell Middle Eastern food from a cart!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Hey, your English is getting better!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, she may be the hottest girl I've ever hated.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What... what you working on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, Monica and Chandler's recommendation. I want it to sound smart but.. I don't know any big words or anything, so...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why don't you use your Thesaurus?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What did I just say?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Watch. Here, you ehm... You highlight the word you want to change.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God, that's great! I'm smart!! No, no, I'm... "brainy, bright, clever", I love this thing! Look out ladies, Joey Tribbiani's got the whole package!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: So beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I know, isn't she?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: No, I was talking about your bedding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right. What's your news, Amy?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Oh! Um... Well... I'm getting married.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Oh my God! To who?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: This guy! He has a killer apartment.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A-And??

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: A-And it's on Fifth. And the elevator opens up right into the living room.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, what's he like?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Oh! He's ok. Do you remember my old boyfriend Mark?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: It's his dad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh... wow, so he's gotta be...

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Old? Yeah! But he travels a lot, so he's hardly ever there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sweety, I gotta tell ya... it sounds a little bit like you like the apartment more than you like...

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Myron. Hmm... I told you he was old!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... sit down, sit down. Oh, honey, you know, I once also almost married somebody that I didn’t love. Do you remember Barry?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Humpf, remember him? How we used to make out all the time after you went to sleep.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sometimes just nodding is ok. Uhm, so but anyway, listen, not marrying Barry was the best decision that I ever, ever made. Honey, you deserve true love. Your soulmate is out there, somewhere. Someone that is your age, that is smart, that is fun and that you care about!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You’re right, you’re right! I’m gonna do it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I’m gonna marry Myron and keep looking for Mr Right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, let’s keep talking.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Excuse me, anniversary. Excuse me, anniversary. . Uhm, sir, could you move your nachos... they’re in my seat. It's my anniversary. Here we are! . Can’t believe it's been a whole year!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I know. This has been the best year... THIS HAS BEEN THE BEST YEAR OF MY LIFE!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: ME TOO! I NEVER THOUGHT I COULD LOVE SOMEONE THIS MUCH!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I FEEL THE SAME WAY!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: YOU’RE SO GENEROUS AND KIND AND YOU'RE AMAZING IN BED IT’S OUR ANNIVERSARY!

utterance.speaker: Announcer
utterance.content: Knicks fans, please turn your attention to the big screen on the score board. Someone has a special question to ask.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh how lame... oh, it’s so tacky, and impersonal.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it’s the worst way to propose!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Excuse me... .

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, finished my recommendation. Here. And I think you’ll be very, very happy. It’s the longest I ever spent on a computer without looking at porn.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t... uh... understand.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Some of the words are a little too sophisticated for ya?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It doesn’t make any sense.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Of course it does! It’s smart! I used the the-saurus!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: On every word?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yep!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, what was this sentence originally?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, ‘They are warm, nice, people with big hearts’.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And that became ‘they are humid prepossessing Homo Sapiens with full sized aortic pumps...?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah and hey, I really mean it, dude.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Joey, I don’t think we can use this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, because you signed it baby kangaroo Tribbiani . Hey, why don’t you stop worrying about sounding smart and just be yourself!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know what? You don’t need a thesaurus, just write from here, your full sized aortic pump.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Amy, hi!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I took your advice, I left Myron.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, good for you!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I know! I'm Erin Brockovich!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes you are! Oh, I am so proud of you!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Thank you! So, can I stay with you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But Erin Brockovich had her own house.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, look who’s back! Why do you have bags? RACH, WHY DOES SHE HAVE BAGS?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Well, I’m staying with you guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: We’re gonna be roomies! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You slept out here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah... Amy kept kicking me in her sleep yelling ‘Myron, get off!’

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But uhm, we're getting rid of her, right? Rach, please tell me we’re getting rid of her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, I can’t do that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, come on! Last night I was finishing off a pizza and she said "Uoh oh oh, a moment on the lips, forever on the hips!" I don’t need that kind of talk in my house!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well Joey, uhm look, I know that she’s difficult, but I think it’s really good that she’s here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: 'Cause we will appreciate it more when she’s gone?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, it's just... look, you know, when I first moved to the city I was a lot like her! I was spoiled, self-centered and you guys really took care of me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, Monica made us!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, uhm... whatever, I have really appreciated it, 'cause I don’t think I would be the person that I am today if it wasn’t for you guys. See, I wanna help Amy the way you guys helped me. And I know it’s gonna take patience, but that’s ok.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Good morning.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeaah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Amy, that’s what I was supposed to wear today, that’s why I hung it on the door.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Oh, sweety, you can’t pull this off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Amy, you know what? I was thinking that maybe now it'd be a good time for us to sit down and, you know, talk about your future.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Oh, I can’t, honey. I’m gonna go get my eyebrows shaped. I am not happy. Oh... sure you wanna eat that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’M CURVY, AND I LIKE IT!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi. I just had the worst anniversary ever.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I doubt that! Tell her about us last year.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, well, I bought Chandler a five hundred dollar watch and he wrote me a rap song.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Word!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, mine was worse than that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, what happened?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We were at the game, and this guy proposed to his girlfriend on the big screen thing...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that is so tacky.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, that’s what I said, but it turns out, Mike was planning on proposing to me that same way last night!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, Mike was gonna propose?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, that’s huge!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, do you wanna marry him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I really do! Yes, but, after I dumped on the way he was gonna propose to me, I don’t think he’s ever gonna ask again! I mean, I said no in Barbados and now this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She's right! If I were a guy and... Did I just say if I were a guy..?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Maybe you don't need him to propose to you, maybe you can propose to him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I don't know, I don't know, isn't that a little desperate?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I proposed to Chandler! Alright, moving on...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I don't think it was desperate, I think it was amazing!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, do you think I should propose?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I think it could be kind of great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Absolutely! You'll love the feeling! There's nothing like it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, ok, so how should I do it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How about at a game, on the big screen?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uuuh!! How about at a Footlocker?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? what? He obviously thinks that's a nice way to be proposed to, plus he'd never suspect it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, that does make sense. Ok, now, would... would you two like that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sounds good to me... but what would a guy think?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Nana is on the phone

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! That's interesting, since she died seven years ago!!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: She did? Who got her condo in Boca?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello? Oh, it's our nanny! Hi! Oh... God! I hope you feel better! Ok, bye! That's Molly, she's sick. Can you watch Emma today?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I can't. I have back-to-back classes. Did Molly say what she had? Because my throat's been hurting?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Menstrual cramps.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't think that's what this is.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can any of you watch Emma?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, sorry sweety..

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I've got work and then I'm proposing..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Great, shoot, what are we gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Well, I can do it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, actually...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, can I talk to you for a sec.?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Um, I do not want her baby-sitting our child.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, for one thing, she keeps calling her Ella!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wha.. well, Ella's a nice name!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine, we'll call the next one Ella.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wha... the next one?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, um... I don't want her watching our baby.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I am trying to help her become a better person. This is a huge breakthrough for her! She just offered to do something for another human being!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I... I don't know..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I'm telling you, she's giving up getting her eyebrows shaped to do this alright? Do you understand how important that is in our world?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: um... listen, I couldn't help but overhear... 'cause I was trying to... Listen, let me do this alright? I really wanna help you guys out, and plus Rachel's been so wonderful to me...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Absolutely.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Oh! Great! So how much does it pay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Joe! How's the second draft of the letter coming?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great, I'm finished! In fact, I just dropped it off at the agency.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You dropped it off?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can we read it? Can you print out another copy?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No can do amigo. No, I didn't use the computer. Felt more personal to hand-write it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You hand-wrote it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, and don't worry. I didn't try to sound smart at all! See ya later!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, oh my God, that letter is gonna go in our file! We're never gonna get a kid. No, we're gonna be one of those old couples that collects orchids or has a lot of birds!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's ok, it's ok. You know what? I'll just call the agency and tell them to throw out the letter.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello, this is Chandler Bing. Somebody just dropped off a handwritten recommendation letter, and.. Uh-huh... Uh-huh... okay... thank you. Good-bye. .

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ugh, we're screwed, aren't we? You know what? Just tell me on the way to the bird store.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They loved it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They thought it was very smart of us to have a child write the recommendation letter.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They thought Joey was a child?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She guessed 8, 9, based on his drawings.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, what did you guys do today?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Ella wanted to go out, so we went shopping and got some sushi.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That sounds like fun.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Yeah, not really. Babies are dull.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Hi, how's my girl?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I'm fine! And, I got you a present for letting me stay with you. Ready?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Ta-daaa!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You pierced her ears!?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Doesn't it make her nose look smaller?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You pierced her ears? How could you do this without telling me?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Well, if I had told you, then it wouldn't have been surprise, now would it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think she looks cute. ... but I am wrong!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, Oh my God, here comes Ross. He's gonna flip out.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Why, did something happen to his falafel cart?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey guys.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Chandler
utterance.content: Hi Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Emma. Oh, why is she wearing her hat so low? She can barely see. .

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nah, I don't really want her to see.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because there are so many terrible sights in this world.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Like war. Or that thing in Joey's refrigerator. Remember? It was in a milk carton but it looked like meat?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come here Oh! There she is! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nothing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi! What... . Please tell me those are clip-ons.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, they're real!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did she do this to her? I told you we shouldn't have left Emma with her!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, I know, and you were right Ross. You are soo irresponsible I am never letting you baby-sit ever again!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Hey you know what, this kid needs me, okay? She needs to have a cool fun aunt!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm a cool, fun aunt!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: O-Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Monica can be cool and fun at organized indoor projects!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can't believe this. All I wanted to do was help you try to figure out what to do with your life and this is how you repay me?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Well, I don't need you to help me, because I already know what I'm going to do with my life.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Since when?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Since today... I am going to be a baby stylist.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's not a thing!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Well, it should be. I'm gonna help babies learn how to accessorize, what colors to wear, what clothes are slimming...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Babies don't care if they're slim.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Enter Amy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Amy, I ju... I just... I just wanna...

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: What? What are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No more falafel for you!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Great game, huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uhuh, uhuh...

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Why do you keep looking at the screen?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm not. I'm praying. Please let the Knicks win... Thank you Thor! Where... where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Going go to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I think you should wait.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, if you don't... if you don't hold it in, you don't get all the nutrients.

utterance.speaker: Announcer
utterance.content: Knicks fans, please turn your attention to the big screen on the scoreboard. Someone has a special question to ask.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mike Hannigan... will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Announcer
utterance.content: Get a load of this... She's proposing to him. Guess we know who wears the pants in that family.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's not very enlightened!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, hey! Boo us? Boo you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello? Yeah, this is Joey Tribbiani... Oh, hi! Well, I'm glad you liked my letter... No my mommy and daddy aren't home right now... Okay, bye bye. She was nice!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, get Amy's bags, she is moving out!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoo-hoo!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You're kicking me out?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You put holes in my baby's ears!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Yeah well, at least now people will know she is a girl!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can't believe I ever even tried to help you. You are so beyond help.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You know what? Ever since I got here, you have been nothing but negative.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You didn't want me to marry the old guy with the great apartment. Then, I tried to help your daughter to de-emphasize her flaws And suddenly I am the bad guy?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, where are those bags?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She has a lot of crap!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You know what? When I moved in here I thought: This is gonna be so great. Just us sisters, back together again like when we were kids, except without that stupid Jill... Oh! Who has gotten fat by the way...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: hm-mmm... Mom said she gained like fifteen pounds.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hips or thighs?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Ass and face.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Oh my God! I thought she was on Atkins.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: She was. Carbs found her... See, this is what I wanted. Two sisters, talking about real stuff.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I can give you that.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You can?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. I just, I kept trying to make you a better person, but you're... you're already a pretty perfect version of what you are.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Thank you. I've got to admit, Emma does look cute.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Did you just say Emma?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Ugh, I'm sorry... Ella.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That woman at the game didn't know what she was talking about. Mike, obviously you have balls.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: But please, let's just forget the whole thing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I would love it. Consider it forgotten... But just so you know... however and whenever you decide to propose, I promise I'll say yes. Whether... whether, you know, it is in a basketball game, or in sky writing, or you know, like some lame guy in a cheesy movie who hides it in the cake.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's in the cake, isn't it?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Where else would lame Mr. No Balls hide it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What's the matter with me? How do I keep ruining this? I'm sorry, I'm sorry!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: No! It's my fault. I keep trying to propose in these stupid ways and all I wanna do is tell you that I love you and I want to spend the rest of my life with you.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I'm gonna do this now.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Phoebe, I...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait! Oh wait! Oh no!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Ready?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Phoebe, I love you. There's no-one else in the world I would ask to marry me... three times. But I wanna take care of you, have babies with you, and grow old with you... Phoebe Buffay, will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I love you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I love you more!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Not possible! She's gonna be Mrs. No Balls.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So how is the uhm... baby styling business going?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Not that great. It's almost if people don't want to hear that their babies are ugly.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's shocking!

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Oh! It's Ross... Hey Ross! Hello-oo Ross! He's rude!
